game.name: Barbie And The Unicorn
game.description:
Barbie has emerged one of the kind souls today by protecting the princess Annika along with her parents and kingdom. Her courageous deed has ended a thrilling magical journey and helped people to get her cute unicorn back. They all have become friends now and a gala dinner is going to take place in the palace. The doll is quite excited to go there with her beloved Unicorn. However, she needs your fashion advice before making a departure. Join Barbie And The Unicorn game and be prepared to dress her up in a unique style!


Your objective in this brand new dressing game for girls is to help her decide what to put on before making an entry into the magic land of unicorns. This celebration is very big, so make sure to pick up a dress that could help her stand out from the crowd. There is an extensive collection of marvelous dresses and accessories to explore. Put your imagination and fashion abilities to test to make her look astonishing in this one of the best games for girls! 

Dress her up as many times as you want and keep experimenting until you create an awesome result in this html5 princess game! Interact with the things using your mouse and work on every portion while starting from a cute hairstyle, elegant dresses to coolest accessories! No need to wait anymore and hit the Show button immediately after doing your job. Feel free to save your lovely piece of artwork and enjoy the dress up adventure all over again, no download required!
